Consular/Visa Services Unit 2702, 27th Floor, One World Place,32nd Street, Bonifacio Global City, Taguig City 1634, Metro Manila Timing For submission of documents: 1000 hrs - 1200 hrs (No appointment needed) For release of documents: 1500 hrs - 1600 hrs Address of Embassy's Main Office: Address: 2190 Paraiso St., Manila 9000 hrs to 1730 hrs (Weekdays except holidays) Note: The Embassy's main office is open weekdays except holidays from 9000 hrs to 1730 hrs.
